summary: A web project (possibly for a social/community organization) that includes a counter feature and a gallery section. The counter is set to zero. A gallery entry named 'सालाना जलसा 2026' is being added.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a speaker presenting in front of a projected Hindi slide to an audience seated indoors (jalsa-2026-1.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a speaker presenting next to a green projected slide to an attentive outdoor audience (jalsa-2026-2.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing a large outdoor gathering of men seated in chairs on a terrace/balcony area with lush trees in the background (jalsa-2026-3.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Optimize and save the uploaded event photo showing speakers addressing a large seated outdoor crowd on a terrace with tall trees visible in the background (jalsa-2026-4.dim_1200x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a Gallery section on the website (if it does not already exist) and add a gallery album entry titled 'सालाना जलसा 2026' (Saalana Jalsa 2026) displaying the 4 uploaded event photos as static assets served from frontend/public/assets/generated/.

new_feature_requests.summary: गैलेरी में 'सालाना जलसा 2026' नाम से एंट्री एड करें
